sub_topic: The relationship between the Julia set and the Mandelbrot set.
message_1: What is the area of the primary bulb of the Mandelbrot set? Round your answer to the nearest hundredth.
message_2:
The area of the primary bulb (the main cardioid) of the Mandelbrot set can be calculated using the formula:

Area = (π/2) * (1 - 1/4)

Area ≈ 0.5 * π * (3/4)

Area ≈ 1.178097

Rounded to the nearest hundredth, the area of the primary bulb of the Mandelbrot set is approximately 1.18.
